text: @realDonaldTrump The global study testing the effectiveness of hydroxychloroquine as a COVID-19 treatment has been discontinued as of 5/25 citing patients receiving the drug experienced a significantly higher risk of dying then those who didn’t receive the drug

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
